case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_address_found_1: 2.8 miles south of HWY 93 at MP 10
case_address_found_2: Less than one mile east from the hwy near MP 13 in a wash
case_circumstances: Skeletal elements discovered in remote desert wash by park rangers on patrol.
case_head_hair: Park rangers described hair found in context with the remains as "red", and the anthropologist described the same hair in the laboratory as "blond to light brown" and  20 inches in length. Microscopic observation suggests that the hair is bleached, and the root end is medium brown; the bleaching probably took place three to five weeks prior to death.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_with_body: Fragments of fabric were recovered in context with the remains
case_eyewear: A dark colored broken lens was recovered in context with the remains
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
